MIMIC-III
(‘Medical
Information Mart for
Intensive Care’)
is a large, single-center database comprising
information relating to patients admitted to critical care units at a large tertiary care hospital. Data includes

vital signs, medications,
laboratory measurements, observations and notes charted by care providers, ﬂuid

balance, procedure codes, diagnostic codes,
imaging reports, hospital
length of stay, survival data, and
more. The database supports applications including academic and industrial research, quality improvement
